messages.subject: Sources for music anecdotes
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/6/02 6:24:56 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes: Here are some cool music websites I found when the last
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/6/02 6:24:56 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

Here are some cool music websites I found when the last classical discussion
rolled around and I went a searchin'...

http://www.kdfc.com/classical/main.cfm
This one has bios on nine great composer, music factoids and so on.


http://www.mozartproject.org/
The life and times of Mozart

http://music.mpr.org/programs/opera/
If you scroll down there is a segment that tells the story behind the writing
of some operas, The Magic Flute included.

Hope some of these help your search Tia, happy reading!

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
